column1: # Ash content (% on dry matter basis) for modelled feed entities
#   - model_entity: Name of entity in model
#   - ash_content_pct_dm: Ash content as percentage of dry matter
#   - source_feed: Feed name from feedtables.com used for this value

column4: No specific match - using banana fruit as proxy
No barley straw in table - wheat straw as proxy for cereal straw
No maize stover - using wheat straw as cereal residue proxy
No millet stover - using wheat straw as cereal residue proxy
No pulse straw - using wheat straw as general crop residue proxy
No rice straw - using wheat straw as cereal residue proxy
Using maize grain as proxy for whole plant silage
Using grain sorghum ash as closest available entry on feedtables.com
No sorghum stover - using wheat straw as cereal residue proxy
No sugarcane tops - using wheat straw as general plant residue proxy
